That's why I was SO excited to discover these **LOFCA Silicone Letter Beads** on AliExpress! üòç They're a lifesaver for teething babies, and they're just plain adorable. 

**Here's why I'm obsessed (and why you will be too!):**

* **100% Food Grade Silicone:** No nasty chemicals here! These beads are completely safe for your little one to gnaw on to their heart's content. 
* **Soft on Gums:** The silicone is super soft and flexible, providing soothing relief for sore gums.  
* **Fun and Educational:** These aren't just any teething beads, they're alphabet beads! They're perfect for helping your little one develop their fine motor skills and learn their ABCs.  
* **Endless Possibilities:** String them together to make teething necklaces, attach them to pacifier clips, or use them for DIY sensory toys ‚Äì get creative!
* **Unbeatable Price:** At just $9.48 for 100 beads, this is a steal you can't miss!
